entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
